name: Ace Attorney: Ultimate Justice
storyline: Case 1: The Unlucky Turnabout- When a mailman is murdered, Makoto Naegi, the Ultimate Lucky Student, is accused of the crime. With the help of Makoto’s younger sister, Komaru, Phoenix Wright faces an old enemy in court once again. Together, they’ll take down testimony and try to prove Makoto’s innocence before it’s too late.
summary: Ultimate Justice is a fan-made crossover between the murder mysteries franchise of Ace Attorney and Danganronpa. It will follow the lawyers of the Wright Anything Agency as they defend students of Hope’s Peak in various murder cases.
